newsitem.title: USA: Nitinol Medical Technologies revises IPO terms.
newsitem.headline: Nitinol Medical Technologies revises IPO terms.

text.p: Nitinol Medical Technologies Inc is now planning to offer three million shares at an estimated price range of $9 to $12 per share in its upcoming initial public offering, according to a revised filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
The company had initially filed for an offering of 2.7 million shares with a price range of $12 to $14 per share.
The offering, lead-managed by J.P. Morgan & Co, is tentatively set for the week of September 23. The proposed stock symbol on Nasdaq is "NMTI".
Nitinol Medical designs, develops and markets medical devices that utilize advanced materials and are delivered by minimally invasive procedures.
